name: 3D Quasars
description:
This is a homebrought game, run on Gameboy Color. Original version: John P. Shay - Solar Software Ltd., Commodore 16/Plus4, 1986. Created with GB-Studio 2.0.0 beta5!

Also available for download in .CIA format for the Nintendo 3DS virtual console!

The Proxima war was a long time in the winning and fighting was never more intense than in its closing years. Federation members were forced back to their home planets, and the emphasis shifted from space to surface warfare.  With nuclear photons the enemy have blasted a way through the Quasar defence system. As captain of a Taranula C1 patrol ship, you must attack the enemy craft and defend the Planet.

Move: Cursor LEFT/RIGHT
Fire: B 

Move: LEFT/RIGHT
Fire: X

3D Quasars - Solar Software

Creators webpage (WLS): 3D Quasars
